mapper.sql: order_id, tourist_id, scene_id, order_goaddress, order_date, order_num, status_id, order_other
mapper.insert: insert into tra_scene_order_rel (order_id, tourist_id, scene_id, order_goaddress, order_date, order_num, status_id, order_other) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{touristId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sceneId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderGoaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tra_scene_order_rel
order_id,
tourist_id,
scene_id,

order_date,
order_num,

mapper.update:
update tra_scene_order_rel
tourist_id = #{touristId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
scene_id = #{sceneId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_goaddress = #{orderGoaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status_id = #{statusId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_other = #{orderOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tra_scene_order_rel set tourist_id = #{touristId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, scene_id = #{sceneId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_goaddress = #{orderGoaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status_id = #{statusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_other = #{orderOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t.order_id, t.tourist_id, u.tourist_nickname, t.scene_id, s.scene_name, t.order_goaddress, t.order_date, t.status_id, t.order_num, t.order_other from tra_scene_order_rel t ,tra_scene s ,tra_tourist u where t.tourist_id=u.tourist_id and t.scene_id=s.scene_id

select t.tourist_nickname, s.scene_name, r.order_id, r.tourist_id, r.scene_id, r.order_goaddress, r.order_date, r.order_num, r.status_id, r.order_other from tra_scene_order_rel r ,tra_tourist t ,tra_scene s where r.tourist_id = t.tourist_id and r.scene_id=s.scene_id and r.scene_id in ( select scene_id from tra_scene where scene_id in ( select scene_id from tra_scene_group_rel where sgp_id in ( select sgp_id from tra_scene_group where sgp_id=#{sgpId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) ) )
